title: CASA Locations - HRA
text: This is a map and list of CASA Office locations. Central Intake: 495 Clermont Ave, 7th Floor Brooklyn, NY 11238 Phone: 929-221-8851, 929-221-8889 | Fax: 718-230-0424, 718-230-0841 | E-fax: 917-639-0676 Immediate need requests only: 917-639-0665 CASA South: 2400 Fulton Street, 3rd Floor Brooklyn, NY 11233 Tel: 718-250-5631 | Fax: 718-250-6523 CASA 11: 495 Clermont Ave, 7th Floor Brooklyn, NY 11238 Phone: 929-221-2329, 929-221- 2824 | Fax: 718-636-7843 CASA North: 132 West 125th Street, 5th Floor New york, NY 10027 Phone: 212-274-5043 | Fax: 212-666-5640, 212-665-1620 Staten Island CASA: 215 Bay Street, 2nd Floor Staten Island, NY 10301 Tel: 929-221-8769 | Fax: 718-556-7315, 718-556-8253
